content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to see information about account ACC-1001. According to the orchestrator's role:

1. Account information requests should be handled by Account Agent
2. The user provided a specific account number (ACC-1001)
3. Need to confirm understanding before routing the request

Since this is an account details request, I'll use the account_agent tool with the provided account number to retrieve owner details, creation date, etc. No financial transactions were requested, so Ledger Agent isn't needed here.</thinking>
